attributes.synopsis: Stylish spy thriller starring Charlize Theron as an MI6 agent despatched to a chaotic, paranoia-ridden Berlin just before the fall of the Wall. (2017)(110 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Stylish spy thriller starring Charlize Theron as an MI6 agent despatched to a chaotic, paranoia-ridden Berlin just before the fall of the Wall.
attributes.synopsisLong: Charlize Theron lays down some serious smack in this stylish spy thriller, starring as an ass-kicking MI6 agent, Lorraine Broughton, despatched to a chaotic, paranoia-ridden Berlin just before the fall of the Wall. Her assignment is to clear up an embarrassing mess involving the death of a fellow operative and the theft of some super-sensitive intel, a not-so-simple task which requires her to rendezvous with man in the field David Percival (James McAvoy) - a vodka-soaked catastrophe whose allegiances are less than crystal clear. Masterminding the impressively lean and muscular action sequences is director and former stunt co-ordinator David Leitch.
attributes.title: Atomic Blonde

attributes.synopsis: Scarlett Johansson stars as a cyborg government agent on the trail of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi action with Juliette Binoche. (2017)(107 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Scarlett Johansson stars as a cyborg government agent on the trail of a mysterious hacker. Live-action reimagining of the classic animation.
attributes.synopsisLong: Scarlett Johansson slips into the lithe, ultra-resilient endoskeleton of The Major, a high-tech cyborg who leads a counter cyber-terrorism team in the government department Section 9. When a shadowy hacker targets her creator - corporate artificial intelligence giant Hanka Robotics - The Major is despatched to take him down. However, she discovers a far-reaching conspiracy...and the terrifying knowledge she may not be who she thinks she is. Snow White And The Huntsman director Rupert Sanders rewires the hugely popular Japanese manga in eye-popping style.
attributes.title: Ghost In The Shell (2017)

attributes.synopsis: Blockbuster superhero adventure starring Gal Gadot as an Amazon warrior princess who leaves her hidden island home to fight in the Great War. (2017)(136 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Blockbuster superhero adventure starring Gal Gadot as an Amazon warrior princess who leaves her hidden island home to fight in the Great War.
attributes.synopsisLong: When an American pilot (Chris Pine) crash-lands on her island paradise of Themyscira, supernaturally-gifted Amazonian princess Diana (Gal Gadot) learns that a massive conflict - World War One - is raging in the outside world. She immediately opts to join him and travels to London to contribute her skills to the fight. Diana is the closest we've had to a straightforward hero in years: idealistic and pure of heart, guileless and forthright. In other words, she'll stride into battle without hesitation and grin while kicking a dastardly German through a window.
attributes.title: Wonder Woman (2017)

attributes.sortTitle: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
attributes.synopsis: A ragtag group of rebels embark on a daring, against-all-odds mission to thwart the planet-destroying plans of the Empire. Thrilling fantasy adventure with Felicity Jones. (2016)(128 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A ragtag group of rebels embark on a daring, against-all-odds mission to thwart the planet-destroying plans of the Empire. With Felicity Jones.
attributes.synopsisLong: It's a much-anticipated return to the legendary galaxy far, far away as Godzilla director Gareth Edwards serves up the first of three stand-alone Star Wars adventures. Events pick up directly before A New Hope, with the beleaguered Rebel Alliance desperately scrambling to stop the completion of the Empire's new super-weapon - the Death Star. To prevent untold destruction, fugitive Jyn Erso (Felicity Jones) - the daughter of Death Star designer Galen Erso (Mads Mikkelsen) - must team up with an unlikely band of heroes and steal crucial plans. With Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn and British star Riz Ahmed.
attributes.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
attributes.titleMedium: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

attributes.synopsis: After he inadvertently awakens an ancient Egyptian sorceress, renegade US soldier Tom Cruise must race to save the world from her army of the undead. (2017)(106 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: After he inadvertently awakens an ancient Egyptian sorceress, renegade US soldier Tom Cruise must race to save the world from her army of the undead.
attributes.synopsisLong: Universal Pictures resurrects its monster classic with Tom Cruise in the thick of the fantasy action as army rogue Nick Morton, a treasure-stealing scoundrel who stumbles upon the long-buried tomb of the evil Egyptian princess Ahmanet (Sofia Boutella) while scouting in Iraq. Together with archaeologist Jenny Halsey (Annabelle Wallis), Morton is ordered to escort the sarcophagus to England for safekeeping. However, after killing her father and waiting 5,000 years to rule over mankind, the vengeful Ahmanet has other plans. Swarming with creatures, curses and apocalyptic peril - plus Russell Crowe as a scientist with a notoriously dark side - there's enough excitement here to raise the dead.
attributes.title: The Mummy (2017)

attributes.synopsis: Secret agent Tom Cruise races to clear his name and unmask the mole in the CIA. Action thriller with Jon Voight and Ving Rhames. Moderate violence/flashing images. (1996)(106 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Secret agent Tom Cruise races to clear his name and unmask the mole in the CIA. Action thriller with Jon Voight and Ving Rhames.
attributes.synopsisLong: Tom Cruise is undercover agent Ethan Hunt, who devises a risky plan to expose the traitor who betrayed him and his colleagues. Based on the smash 1960s TV series, Brian De Palma's ballistic action thriller pushes all the right buttons and boasts some impressive setpieces, including a breathtaking raid on a CIA vault.
attributes.title: Mission: Impossible

attributes.synopsis: Thunderous action sequel starring Tom Cruise as a secret agent in a race to stop a deadly virus and villainous Dougray Scott. John Woo directs. Violence/flashing images. (2000)(119 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Thunderous action sequel starring Tom Cruise as a secret agent in a race to stop a deadly virus and villainous Dougray Scott. John Woo directs.
attributes.synopsisLong: Thunderous action sequel starring Tom Cruise as a secret agent in a race to stop a deadly virus and villainous Dougray Scott. John Woo directs.
attributes.title: Mission: Impossible II

attributes.synopsis: Can retired super spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) defeat an arms dealer without his new lady finding out his secret past? Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2006)(121 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Can retired super spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) defeat an arms dealer without his new lady finding out his secret past? Action sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: For his third assignment, Tom Cruise's secret agent Ethan Hunt puts on a brave face to save the world (and his new wife) from a ruthless arms dealer (Philip Seymour Hoffman). This mission - should you choose to accept it - delivers preposterous thrills and spills from the first frame as Lost guru and Star Trek rebooter JJ Abrams keeps the action fizzling along faster than a burning fuse.
attributes.title: Mission: Impossible III

attributes.synopsis: Testosterone-fuelled thriller with marshal Wesley Snipes pursuing Gary Busey, the unhinged villain who skydives onto federal buildings to steal official secrets. (1994)(98 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Wesley Snipes skydives into action as the U.S. marshal taking on a corrupt DEA agent played by Gary Busey.
attributes.synopsisLong: Testosterone-heavy action thriller starring Wesley Snipes as the marshal pursuing an unhinged villain (Gary Busey) who skydives onto federal buildings to steal official secrets. Passenger 57 meets Cliffhanger in this high-flying action outing from John "Bird on a Wire" Badham. Snipes convincingly takes his first steps towards roles like Blade (although the role was initially offered to Steven Seagal).
attributes.title: Drop Zone

attributes.synopsis: Disgraced cop hotshot Colin Farrell is given a chance at redemption when he joins a crack team led by Samuel L Jackson, but their first assignment erupts into carnage. (2003)(113 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Disgraced cop hotshot Colin Farrell is given a chance at redemption when he joins a crack team led by Samuel L Jackson
attributes.synopsisLong: It's the acronym for action as maverick Special Weapons And Tactics officer (Colin Farrell) and his no-nonsense boss (Samuel L Jackson) are charged with escorting Olivier Martinez's dodgy French kingpin across town when it all goes pear-shaped. Michelle Rodriguez is the sole female member of the team with LL Cool J providing heavy duty back-up. Hold on to your H. A. T. S.
attributes.title: S.W.A.T

attributes.synopsis: Ace pilots Jamie Foxx and Jessica Biel race to stop a superplane that has gone haywire. Action at Mach speed from the director of The Fast And The Furious. (2005)(116 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Ace pilots Jamie Foxx and Jessica Biel race to stop a superplane that has gone haywire.
attributes.synopsisLong: Top Gun has a mid-air collision with Knight Rider in this ludicrously watchable action thriller. Three crack US Navy pilots - Jamie Foxx, Jessica Biel and Josh Lucas - are forced to take on a robot Stealth fighter as their wingman... with dire consequences when it develops a will of its own. Original Fast and Furious director Rob Cohen pulls off some stunning aerial sequences while his star trio give Tom Cruise a run for his money when it comes to tooth-flashing bravado.
attributes.title: Stealth

attributes.synopsis: New York subway cops Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson try to rob an armoured underground train loaded with millions of dollars. Action comedy with Jennifer Lopez. (1995)(105 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Subway cops Wesley Snipes and Woody Harrelson try to rob an armoured underground train. Action comedy with Chris Cooper and Jennifer Lopez.
attributes.synopsisLong: Two New York subway cops - Woody Harrelson and Wesley Snipes - decide to rob a train loaded with millions of dollars when they get fed up with their sadistic boss (Robert Blake). Jennifer Lopez is the curvaceous ever-lipsticked cop who comes between our heroes in this likeable action comedy.
attributes.title: Money Train

attributes.synopsis: Mark Wahlberg is the ex-Marine marksman out to find the men who framed him for an assassination attempt on the President. Action thriller. Strong language/violence. (2007)(121 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mark Wahlberg is the ex-Marine marksman out to find the men who framed him for an assassination attempt on the President. Action thriller.
attributes.synopsisLong: Mark Wahlberg aims for revenge as Bob Lee Swagger, the ex-Marine marksman framed as a presidential assassin by a ruthless colonel (Danny Glover) and his shady government cabal. Owing more than a passing debt to Tom Clancy and The Fugitive, the director of Training Day leaves the safety catch off for a thriller that's bang on target for action junkies.
attributes.title: Shooter

attributes.synopsis: Grizzled cop Nick Nolte and wiseass crook Eddie Murphy clash when they're thrown together to catch a killer. Action comedy hit. Contains strong language/sex/violence. (1982)(92 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Grizzled cop Nick Nolte and wiseass crook Eddie Murphy clash when they're thrown together to catch a killer. Action comedy hit.
attributes.synopsisLong: Nick Nolte is the grizzled cop saddled with Eddie Murphy's wise-cracking crook in Walter Hill's much-loved, much-quoted action thriller. When a pair of escaped convicts gun down two of his colleagues, tough, white San Francisco cop Jack Cates (Nolte) is forced to spring smooth-talking black criminal Reggie Hammond (Murphy) from jail on a two-day release to help him track down the killers. A surefire hit that paved the way for every buddy caper from Midnight Run to Rush Hour.
attributes.title: 48 Hrs.

attributes.synopsis: Nick Nolte's no-nonsense cop reteams with Eddie Murphy's motor-mouthed crook to take down a ruthless San Francisco drug lord. Strong language/violence/sex/flashing images. (1990)(91 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Nick Nolte's no-nonsense cop reteams with Eddie Murphy's motor-mouthed crook to take down a ruthless San Francisco drug lord. Action comedy sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Nick Nolte's no-nonsense cop Cates reteams with Eddie Murphy's motormouthed crook Hammond for the sequel to Walter Hill's 1982 action comedy smash. This time, Cates' job is on the line as the mismatched pair take on a gang of homicidal bikers. Original director Walter Hill also returns to orchestrate the wreckage and never lets his foot off the gas... though there's never a shortage of gas with Murphy on board.
attributes.title: Another 48 Hrs

attributes.synopsis: Brad Pitt and Julia Roberts star in a wild road caper involving a cursed antique gun, kidnapping and a sensitive Mob hitman. Co-starring the late James Gandolfini. (2001)(119 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Brad Pitt and Julia Roberts star in a wild road caper involving a cursed antique gun, kidnapping and a sensitive Mob hitman. With James Gandolfini.
attributes.synopsisLong: Brad Pitt and Julia Roberts pair up for this screwball crime caper from the director of Pirates of the Caribbean. Pitt stars as a reluctant gangster whose boss orders him to smuggle an ancient (and supposedly cursed) pistol called The Mexican across the border. Meanwhile, his neurotic girlfriend (Roberts) has been snatched by a hitman (James Gandolfini)... who turns out to be a lot more sensitive than her dumb fella. Prepare for twists, turns and rat-a-tat banter straight out of the Tarantino handbook.
attributes.title: The Mexican

attributes.synopsis: Rambo causes carnage when he tries to rescue missionaries held hostage in Burma. Action with Sylvester Stallone. Contains strong language, violence and flashing images. (2008)(91 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Rambo causes carnage when he tries to rescue missionaries held hostage in Burma. Action with Sylvester Stallone.
attributes.synopsisLong: Holed up in Thailand, offering boat rides and collecting snakes for the locals, John Rambo is living out the remainder of his existence in isolation. That is, until a band of Christian aid workers ask for a lift into Burma, home of the world's longest running civil war. A super-violent film that harks back to the action of the 80s, Stallone's other monosyllabic hero still packs a punch in a thoroughly entertaining, though extremely bloodthirsty movie few thought would succeed.
attributes.title: Rambo

attributes.synopsis: Sylvester Stallone packs a punch as the ageing boxer back in the ring for one last fight, defying his doubting son and friends. Sixth instalment in the Rocky franchise. (2006)(102 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Sylvester Stallone packs a punch as the ageing boxer back in the ring for one last fight. Sixth instalment in the iconic franchise.
attributes.synopsisLong: Sylvester Stallone dons his gloves in anger for the last time as the Italian Stallion ends his fighting career on a poignant and heartfelt high. A media frenzy sees Rocky put forward as the only credible challenger to publicity-hungry heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon (Antonio Tarver). Is it one round too many for the ageing Italian Stallion? Absolutely not. Stallone's in top form as he writes, directs and trains like there's no tomorrow for the best Rocky movie since 1979.
attributes.title: Rocky Balboa

attributes.synopsis: When the commander of his old military unit is arrested on trumped-up spy charges, vigilante Tom Cruise must save the day. (2016)(118 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When the commander of his old military unit is arrested on trumped-up spy charges, it's time for vigilante Jack Reacher to go to work. Action sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Tom Cruise returns to action as author Lee Child's roaming vigilante Jack Reacher in a story that sees him dragged into a military conspiracy with a new-found ally. When the commander of his old military unit, Major Susan Turner (Cobie Smulders), is arrested on trumped up spy charges, it's time for Reacher to go to work. But his mission to take down the bad guys is complicated when they target a teenage girl (Danika Yarosh) who might just be his daughter. Cruise's Last Samurai director Edward Zwick calls the shots, kicks and punches on a thriller that's as ruthlessly effective as its hero.
attributes.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back

attributes.synopsis: Tom Cruise plays an elusive and brutal investigator who uses strong-arm tactics to catch a killer. Action with Rosamund Pike. Violence/flashing images. (2013)(125 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Tom Cruise stars as an elusive and brutal investigator who uses strong-arm tactics to catch a multiple murderer. Action with Rosamund Pike.
attributes.synopsisLong: Tom Cruise steps confidently into the formidable shoes of author Lee Child's military cop-turned-drifter who becomes part of the investigation when a former army sniper takes the rap for gunning down five innocent people. But as defence lawyer Rosamund Pike soon discovers, asking for Reacher's help is asking for trouble. Directed and adapted from the ninth Reacher novel One Shot by Oscar-winning writer Christopher McQuarrie (The Usual Suspects), the first movie outing for Child's vigilante hero is much like the man himself: cool, compelling and ruthlessly efficient. Fans of bold casting get the added bonus of maverick filmmaker Werner Herzog as the villain.
attributes.title: Jack Reacher

attributes.synopsis: Only one man can save the President... but first he's got to break out of maximum security. Spymaster Samuel L Jackson recruits Ice Cube for heavy duty action. (2005)(97 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Ice Cube is the new agent sent to Washington to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders in this actioner.
attributes.synopsisLong: Vin Diesel's put on Ice - Ice Cube to be exact - for this effects-heavy sequel to action caper xXx. It's oil change as Vin Diesel bows out and his place as defender of the red, white and blue is taken by rapper-turned-action star Cube. This time out a liberal president is being targeted by a splinter group of grumpy dissenters deep in the US government. Samuel L Jackson sacrifices any pride he may have had as xXx's gung-ho boss Augustus Gibbons.
attributes.title: xXx2: The Next Level

attributes.synopsis: Vin Diesel is back as beefed-up superspy Xander Cage, brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon. Action sequel. (2017)(103 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Vin Diesel is back as beefed-up superspy Xander Cage, brought out of exile to retrieve a powerful weapon known as Pandora's Box. Action sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Pumped-up athlete-turned- government operative Xander Cage (Vin Diesel) comes back from the dead to take on deadly alpha male warrior Xiang (Donnie Yen) and his team in a race to recover a sinister and seemingly unstoppable weapon known as Pandora's Box. Recruiting an all-new group of thrill-seeking cohorts, Xander finds himself enmeshed in a deadly conspiracy that points to collusion at the highest levels of world governments.
attributes.title: Xxx: Return of Xander Cage

attributes.synopsis: When terrorists hijack a passenger jet, Special Forces warrior Chuck Norris negotiates the only way he knows how. Bazooka action with Lee Marvin. (1986)(124 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When terrorists hijack a passenger jet, Special Forces warrior Chuck Norris negotiates the only way he knows how. Bazooka action with Lee Marvin.
attributes.synopsisLong: Chuck Norris declares war on terrorists who have taken hostages aboard a Boeing 707. Not that he needs them, but he's grateful for the assistance of Lee Marvin's world-weary colonel and a nifty motorbike primed with multiple rocket launchers. Trademark Norris, with more explosions than you can shake a stick of dynamite at and Robert Forster and David Menahem lending proceedings an evil chill as the baddies.
attributes.title: The Delta Force

attributes.synopsis: Liam Neeson loves it when a plan comes together in this all-action remake of the TV classic. With Bradley Cooper. Contains strong language/violence/flashing images. (2010)(114 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Liam Neeson loves it when a plan comes together in this all-action remake of the TV classic. With Bradley Cooper and Jessica Biel.
attributes.synopsisLong: John Hannibal Smith took his sweet time before devising a plan that would get his motley crew of army rejects The A-Team onto the big screen... which might explain the amount of explosions in Joe Carnahan's adaptation of the immensely popular TV show. Liam Neeson leads the rebooted A-Team as they attempt to clear their names when, of course, accused of a crime they didn't commit.
attributes.title: The A-Team

attributes.synopsis: Wrongly accused of murder, a New York gang must fight its way back to Coney Island. Cult thriller from 48 Hrs director Walter Hill. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (1979)(89 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Wrongly accused of murder, a New York gang must fight its way back to Coney Island. Cult action thriller from 48 Hrs director Walter Hill.
attributes.synopsisLong: Coney Island street gang The Warriors are forced to find their way home through enemy turf when they are framed for the murder of a rival gang leader. Director Walter Hill, who would go on to make Southern Comfort and 48 Hrs, directs this macho punch-fest with gritty elan. Who can forget the taunt "Warriors, come out to play..."?
attributes.title: The Warriors (1979)

attributes.synopsis: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath reluctant hitman John Wick is back to doing what he does best. Chest-pounding action sequel with Keanu Reeves. (2017)(118 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath reluctant hitman Keanu Reeves is back to doing what he does best. Action sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Keanu Reeves makes a blistering return as everyone's favourite hitman - John Wick. After avenging the death of his beloved puppy (yes, puppy) he wants nothing more than to escape the criminal underworld and live the quiet life. But when an old acquaintance emerges from the shadows and holds him to a blood oath, it's back to doing what he does best. This involves travelling to Rome and taking out the powerful sister of a scheming Italian crime lord (Riccardo Scamarcio), although - as you might well expect - things don't quite go to plan. Chest-pounding action sequel with Common, Laurence Fishburne and Ian McShane.
attributes.title: John Wick: Chapter Two

attributes.synopsis: Danny Trejo is on a bloody mission of revenge in Robert Rodriguez's grisly grindhouse romp. With Jessica Alba and Robert De Niro. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2010)(101 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Danny Trejo is on a bloody mission of revenge in Robert Rodriguez's grisly grindhouse romp. With Jessica Alba and Robert De Niro.
attributes.synopsisLong: Danny Trejo is on a bloody mission of revenge in Robert Rodriguez's grisly grindhouse romp. With Jessica Alba and Robert De Niro. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2010)(101 mins)
attributes.title: Machete

attributes.synopsis: Disaster thriller starring Gerard Butler as a scientist called into action when his climate control system malfunctions. With Ed Harris. (2017)(105 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Disaster thriller starring Gerard Butler as a scientist called into action when his state-of-the-art climate control system malfunctions.
attributes.synopsisLong: Independence Day and Godzilla co-writer Dean Devlin makes his directorial debut, pitting Gerard Butler against some very, very bad weather. The London Has Fallen star is Jake Lawson, a bad-boy scientist behind the creation of a state-of-the-art climate control system that uses a vast satellite network to keep global warming and its devastating effects at bay. Of course the system - codenamed Dutch Boy - ends up malfunctioning, so Jake has to suit up and head into space to investigate. Also hoping Mother Nature doesn't obliterate all of mankind are Jim Sturgess, as Jake's estranged younger brother, and Andy Garcia.
attributes.title: Geostorm

attributes.synopsis: Music-loving getaway driver Ansel Elgort is coerced into one last heist with colourful criminals Jon Hamm and Jamie Foxx. (2017)(109 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Young getaway driver Ansel Elgort is coerced into one last heist with colourful criminals Jon Hamm and Jamie Foxx. Crime caper from Edgar Wright.
attributes.synopsisLong: Edgar Wright's super-stylish crime caper stars Ansel Elgort (The Fault in Our Stars) as Baby, a music-loving orphan who also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy (Jon Hamm), Bats (Jamie Foxx) and Darling (Eiza Gonzlez) - get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora (Lily James). Easier said than done...
attributes.title: Baby Driver

attributes.synopsis: Hotshot racer Jason Statham is forced to compete in a deadly demolition derby to win his freedom from prison. Futuristic motorized mayhem. Strong language/violence. (2008)(107 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Hotshot racer Jason Statham is forced to compete in a deadly demolition derby to win his freedom from prison. Futuristic motorized mayhem.
attributes.synopsisLong: Hotshot racer Jason Statham is forced to compete in a deadly demolition derby to win his freedom from prison. Futuristic motorized mayhem.
attributes.title: Death Race

attributes.synopsis: The crew must ride to the rescue when Vin Diesel's Dominic Toretto is blackmailed by a hi-tech terrorist. Full-throttle action with Dwayne Johnson. (2017)(131 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: The crew must ride to the rescue when Vin Diesel's Dominic Toretto is blackmailed by a hi-tech terrorist. Full-throttle action with Dwayne Johnson.
attributes.synopsisLong: The fastest 'family' on four wheels comes under threat when a hi-tech terrorist (Charlize Theron) seduces Dom (Vin Diesel) and persuades him to betray his friends. Her skulduggery sets in motion a trail of auto-carnage that rages from Cuba to New York to the Barents Sea as the crew make a desperate bid stop the blonde anarchist from unleashing global chaos. The brakes are off again for another eye-popping, road-burning rampage that puts as much muscle in the driving seats as under the bonnet. Fasten your s... whoa!
attributes.title: Fast & Furious 8

attributes.synopsis: Tom Holland is Peter Parker - an average kid with a web-slinging alter ego out to protect New York from a menacing new villain. (2017)(129 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Tom Holland plays Peter Parker - an average teen with a web-slinging alter ego who must protect New York City from a menacing new villain.
attributes.synopsisLong: Marvel's friendly neighbourhood crimefighter is back with this sharp, snappy and super-fun reboot. After making a cheeky bow in Captain America: Civil War, rising Brit star Tom Holland gets everyone's spider-senses tingling in his first solo outing as Peter Parker. He has his teenage work cut out, juggling the trials of high school (girls, quizzes, nerdishness) whilst undergoing his superhero internship under the all-seeing eye of Iron-mentor Tony Stark (Robert Downey Jr). Oh, and he has a new foe to deal with in Michael Keaton's working-joe-turned-high-flying-arms dealer, the Vulture.
attributes.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

attributes.synopsis: The ragtag intergalactic heroes are on the run when Star-Lord's long-lost, god-like dad enters the picture. Superhero sequel starring Chris Pratt and Kurt Russell. (2017)(130 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: The ragtag intergalactic heroes are on the run when Star-Lord's long-lost, god-like dad enters the picture. Superhero sequel starring Chris Pratt.
attributes.synopsisLong: James Gunn gets the band back together for more swaggering superhero fun, and this time everything is turned up to eleven. Our ragtag intergalactic heroes - Peter Quill/Star-Lord (Chris Pratt), Gamora (Zoe Saldana), Drax (Dave Bautista), Rocket (Bradley Cooper) and Baby Groot (Vin Diesel) - are on the run from a grudge-holding race known as the Sovereign when Quill's long-lost, god-like dad Ego (Kurt Russell) enters the picture. He seems like a decent enough chap, but nominative determinism most definitely applies. There's also time for Gamora to reignite her rivalry with cyborg sister Nebula (Karen Gillan), while space pirate Yondu (Michael Rooker) has a mutiny on his hands.
attributes.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2

attributes.synopsis: When a road accident robs him of his glittering career, an ego-driven neurosurgeon seeks out the mysterious Ancient One. Marvel blockbuster with Benedict Cumberbatch. (2016)(111 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When a road accident robs him of his glittering career, an ego-driven neurosurgeon (Benedict Cumberbatch) seeks out the mysterious Ancient One.
attributes.synopsisLong: Marvel's latest super-romp sees Benedict Cumberbatch step into the shoes of Dr Stephen Strange, a self-obsessed neurosurgeon with a drawer full of expensive watches and a garage full of supercars. When a road accident robs him of his glittering career and identity, fate takes him to Nepal where a secret order of galaxy-protecting monks help him to lose his ego and reinvent himself. After a stuttering start, Doctor Strange proves a dab hand at the mystic arts, coming to the aid of Tilda Swinton's sorcerer supreme when one of her former pupils (Mads Mikkelsen) goes rogue. Dazzling action adventure with Chiwetel Ejiofor and Rachel McAdams.
attributes.title: Doctor Strange (2016)

attributes.synopsis: Chris Hemsworth returns as the Mighty Avenger, who must battle a race of Dark Elves to save the world. Marvel action with Tom Hiddleston. Contains violence/flashing images. (2013)(108 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Chris Hemsworth returns as the Mighty Avenger, who must battle a race of Dark Elves to save the world. Marvel action with Tom Hiddleston.
attributes.synopsisLong: Faced with the intergalactic warlord Malekith (Christopher Eccleston), a foe that even Odin and Asgard cannot resist, Thor (Chris Hemsworth) must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster (Natalie Portman) and force him to sacrifice everything to save humanity. Outstanding visuals and a healthy sense of silliness ensure it strikes another blockbusting hammer blow for the Marvel brand.
attributes.title: Thor: The Dark World

attributes.synopsis: Robert Downey Jr rockets into action when society comes under threat from a terrorist known as The Mandarin. Superhero sequel. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2013)(126 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Robert Downey Jr rockets into action when society comes under threat from a terrorist known as The Mandarin. Superhero sequel with Gwyneth Paltrow.
attributes.synopsisLong: Robert Downey Jr returns as super industrialist Tony Stark - and heavy metal crimefighter Iron Man - for a third time. Emotionally drained after his exertions in Avengers Assemble, Stark seeks the quiet life with paramour Pepper Potts (Gwyneth Paltrow). However, global terrorist The Mandarin (Ben Kingsley) has other ideas and - aided by his infernal ally, warped scientist Aldrich Killian (Guy Pearce) - sets about brutally dismantling Iron Man's world. Kiss Kiss Bang Bang director Shane Black dynamically retools the franchise in a blockbuster that's both fun and frantic.
attributes.title: Iron Man 3

attributes.synopsis: A team of the world's greatest superheroes unite to try to save mankind. Awesome action with Robert Downey Jr, Scarlett Johansson and Chris Evans. Violence/flashing images. (2012)(138mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A team of the world's greatest superheroes unite to try to save mankind. Awesome action starring Robert Downey Jr.
attributes.synopsisLong: The comic book world's most Marvel-ous team unite as Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr), Captain America (Chris Evans), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), the Incredible Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner) join forces for a superheroic battle to save the world. Under the direction of fanboy supreme Joss Whedon and with the aid of S.H.I.E.L.D. agent Nick Fury (Samuel L Jackson), the crew must stop Thor's evil brother Loki (Tom Hiddleston) from causing mischief of earth-shattering proportions.
attributes.title: Avengers Assemble

attributes.synopsis: Returning soldier The Rock busts some heads when he finds his home town in the clutches of a ruthless drug dealer. Thumping action. Strong language/violence. (2003)(83 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Returning soldier The Rock busts some heads when he finds his home town in the clutches of a ruthless drug dealer. Action.
attributes.synopsisLong: Returning soldier The Rock busts some heads when he finds his home town in the clutches of a ruthless drug dealer. Thumping action with the one man A-Team. (2003)(83 mins)
attributes.title: Walking Tall

attributes.synopsis: Dwayne Johnson takes his space marines to Mars to exterminate murderous zombies. Gory sci-fi actioner based on the classic video game, with Karl Urban. Violent scenes. (2005)(100 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Dwayne Johnson takes his space marines to Mars to exterminate murderous zombies. Gory sci-fi actioner based on the classic video game.
attributes.synopsisLong: Dwayne Johnson and Karl Urban lead a squad of space marines on a mission to battle hellish scientific creations on Mars in this gung-ho adaptation of the smash videogame. Screams echo, guns blaze and general mayhem ensues as the diabolical conspiracy is revealed. But oh yeah, it Rocks.
attributes.title: Doom

attributes.synopsis: A Mexican immigrant trades LA for the North East when he's given a trial at Newcastle United. Fairytale sports drama with Anna Friel and cameos including David Beckham. (2005)(114 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A Mexican immigrant trades LA for the North East when he's given a trial at Newcastle United. Fairytale sports drama.
attributes.synopsisLong: A Mexican immigrant trades LA for the North East when he's given a trial at Newcastle United. Fairytale sports drama with Anna Friel and cameos including David Beckham. (2005)(114 mins)
attributes.title: Goal!

attributes.synopsis: Sports biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. With Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro. (2016)(103 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Sports biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. With Vincent D'Onofrio.
attributes.synopsisLong: Sports biopic charting the meteoric rise of Brazilian football great Pele - from the slums of Sao Paulo to World Cup glory. With Vincent D'Onofrio and Rodrigo Santoro.
attributes.title: Pele: Birth Of A Legend

attributes.synopsis: Robotic carnage as the heroic Autobots take on the evil Decepticons. Will mankind survive? Adrenaline-charged action from director Michael Bay. Flashing images. (2007)(138 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Robotic carnage as the heroic Autobots take on the evil Decepticons. Will mankind survive? Adrenaline-charged action from director Michael Bay.
attributes.synopsisLong: Highly sophisticated robots from a faraway world land on Earth to continue a war that's already decimated their home planet. The 'Autobots' protect human life, yet the 'Decepticons' will stop at nothing to reach their goal - will a pair of high school kids and some military bods stop the carnage, or get caught in between? Director Michael Bay puts pedal to metal in an effects-led extravaganza that dazzles, deafens, stuns and staggers... all at the same time.
attributes.title: Transformers

attributes.synopsis: ...The Fallen: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem. Contains violence/flashing images. (2009)(144 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem.
attributes.synopsisLong: Shia LaBeouf and Megan Fox join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robots. Mechanised mayhem.
attributes.title: Transformers: Revenge Of...

attributes.synopsis: Mark Wahlberg stars as an inventor tasked with saving humanity from impending doom. Blockbuster sci-fi action from Michael Bay. (2017)(149 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mark Wahlberg stars as an inventor tasked with saving humanity from impending doom. Fifth entry in Michael Bay's blockbuster sci-fi action series.
attributes.synopsisLong: It's the fifth instalment in the heavy-metal machine series and Optimus Prime has gone AWOL. The shape-shifting robots are arriving on Earth in increasing numbers to be met with resistance from the Transformers Reaction Force. Meanwhile, inventor Cade Yeager (Mark Wahlberg) hooks up with an English lord (Anthony Hopkins) and a voluptuous Oxford don (Laura Haddock) to thwart Megatron's diabolical plan to drain Earth of all life. Fans of over-sized, antagonistic mecha-beings are well rewarded with another all-action blitz on the senses.
attributes.title: Transformers: The Last Knight

attributes.synopsis: New kid Daniel stands up to his bullies with the help of karate master Mr Miyagi in this family favourite. Starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita. (1984)(122 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: New kid Daniel stands up to his bullies with the help of karate master Mr Miyagi in this family favourite. Starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita.
attributes.synopsisLong: Ralph Macchio stars as a bullied teenager who polishes up his martials arts skills and takes on a motorcylce gang after karate lessons from his building's janitor. The first and best of The Karate Kid series, the show is stolen by Noriyuki "Pat" Morita as the youngster's high kicking mentor. (The Karate Kid was originally one of DC Comics' Legion of Superheroes).
attributes.title: The Karate Kid (1984)

attributes.synopsis: High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Pat Morita and Ralph Macchio. (1986)(113 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Ralph Macchio.
attributes.synopsisLong: Karate kid Daniel (Ralph Macchio) and his mentor Mr Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) travel to Japan to settle a 50-year-old duel of honour. Returning to his father's sick bed, Miyagi is forced to face up to an old love rival Sato... so a battle to the death is arranged by an embittered landowner. More high kicks and high jinks in this follow-up to the wildly successful original. Listen out for Peter Cetera's Oscar-winning Glory of Love song.
attributes.title: The Karate Kid Part II

attributes.synopsis: Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy? Mild violence. (1989)(112 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy?
attributes.synopsisLong: Humiliated high-kickin' villain Kreese (Martin Kove) returns to get his revenge against Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) and Daniel (Ralph Macchio). Bankrupt and still smarting after that defeat, he's enlisted a nasty helping hand... but Daniel turns down the title challenge. More fast-paced martial arts and a winner for those who got off on the previous two instalments.
attributes.title: The Karate Kid III

attributes.synopsis: Mr Miyagi attempts to help a troubled teenage girl get over the death of her parents using the power of martial arts. Family action sequel starring Hilary Swank. (1994)(103 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mr Miyagi attempts to help a troubled teenage girl get over the death of her parents using the power of martial arts. Family action sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Hilary Swank takes over from Ralph Macchio as the object of martial arts guru Mr Miyagi's (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) karate-focused attention. In her breakthrough role, Swank plays a teenage rebel who could clearly do with sorting out her yin and yang. Thus she is taught how to channel her energies... into kicking the heck out of the all-male Alpha Elite of the local military school. Who says boys don't cry?
attributes.title: The Next Karate Kid

attributes.synopsis: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake. Moderate violence. (2010)(135 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake.
attributes.synopsisLong: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake.
attributes.title: The Karate Kid (2010)

attributes.synopsis: Full-throttle thriller about a team of hackers using a devastating hurricane as cover to steal millions. Sky Cinema Original Film from Rob Cohen. (2018)(99 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Full-throttle thriller about a team of hackers using a devastating hurricane as cover to steal millions. Sky Cinema Original Film from Rob Cohen.
attributes.synopsisLong: From director Rob Cohen (The Fast and the Furious, XXX) comes the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, a full-throttle disaster/heist thriller starring Warcraft and Ben-Hur's Toby Kebbell, as well as Taken stalwart Maggie Grace. The former plays Will, a crack meteorologist tracking a devastating hurricane as it bears down on the Gulf Coast of the US. At the same time a team of hackers are plotting to steal millions from a Treasury facility, with the storm providing the perfect cover. Soon Will, ex-Marine brother Breeze (Ryan Kwanten) and Treasury agent Casey (Grace) are the only people standing in their way.
attributes.title: The Hurricane Heist

attributes.synopsis: John Cusack battles to save his family as the end of the world closes in. Disaster epic from director Roland Emmerich, with Danny Glover. Strong language/flashing images. (2009)(152 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: John Cusack battles to save his family as the end of the world closes in. Spectacular disaster epic from Roland Emmerich, with Danny Glover.
attributes.synopsisLong: It's the end of the world as we know it when a solar flare sends the Earth's core into meltdown. The ancient Mayans predicted it would all be over in 2012, but as far as divorced father John Cusack, scientist Chiwetel Ejiofor, and US President Danny Glover are concerned, humanity's time is not up yet. After Independence Day and The Day After Tomorrow, director Roland Emmerich speeds us to doomsday for a third time with an eye-popping display of global pandemonium.

attributes.synopsis: Ben Affleck and Bruce Willis star as expert drillers who are sent into space to plant explosives inside an asteroid headed for Earth. Blockbusting action from Michael Bay. (1998)(144 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Ben Affleck and Bruce Willis star as expert drillers who are sent into space to plant explosives inside an asteroid headed for Earth.
attributes.synopsisLong: Transformers and Pearl Harbor director Michael Bay doesn't do small... and that certainly goes for the asteroid that's about to hit Earth in this colossal sci-fi blockbuster. With Earth about to come off worst in a cosmic collision, Bruce Willis and his team of oil-drilling roughnecks volunteer to intercept and destroy the rapidly approaching space rock. The fact that hotshot engineer Ben Affleck is dating his daughter (Liv Tyler) is just one of the many spanners in the works. A juicy 100% American action-burger with a side-order of cheesy rock, courtesy of Aerosmith.
attributes.title: Armageddon

attributes.synopsis: Mariachi Antonio Banderas sets out to take down a Mexican drugs baron. Steamy action starring Salma Hayek and Quentin Tarantino. Strong language/violence. (1995)(101 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mariachi Antonio Banderas sets out to take down a Mexican drugs baron. Steamy action starring Salma Hayek and Quentin Tarantino.
attributes.synopsisLong: Robert Rodriguez remakes his no-budget action western El Mariachi with a few dollars more to spend on stars, stunts and explosions. Antonio Banderas is the wandering musician who comes to a small Mexican town with revenge in his heart - and death in his guitar case.
attributes.title: Desperado

attributes.sortTitle: Once Upon A Time In Mexico
attributes.synopsis: Johnny Depp's corrupt CIA agent hires guitar-slinging gunman Antonio Banderas to take out a scheming drug lord. Pulpy action sequel with Salma Hayek and Willem Dafoe. (2003)(98 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Johnny Depp's corrupt CIA agent hires guitar-slinging gunman Antonio Banderas to take out a scheming drug lord. Pulpy action sequel with Salma Hayek.
attributes.synopsisLong: After piling up enough bodies to block the entire US-Mexican border in El Mariachi and Desperado, Antonio Banderas returns as the enigmatic, guitar-slinging hero for the third part of Robert Rodriguez's 'Mariachi' trilogy. Johnny Depp triggers the sprawling plot as a corrupt CIA agent who hires Banderas' hitman to bump off a scheming druglord (Willem Dafoe) who's planning a coup d'etat in Mexico. Throw in Mickey Rourke as a flamboyant henchman, Eva Mendes as a ballsy cop and Salma Hayek in steamy flashbacks, and the scene is set for a whirling, swirling, tamale-hot bulletfest.
attributes.title: Once Upon A Time In Mexico
attributes.titleMedium: Once Upon A Time In Mexico

attributes.synopsis: Teen assassin Saoirse Ronan goes on the run from devious CIA agent Cate Blanchett. Breakneck thriller with Eric Bana. Contains strong language/violence/flashing images. (2011)(107 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Teen assassin Saoirse Ronan goes on the run from devious CIA agent Cate Blanchett. Breakneck thriller with Eric Bana.
attributes.synopsisLong: Raised to survive and adapt in the Nordic wilderness by her CIA-exile father (Eric Bana), lethal teenager Hanna (Saoirse Ronan) is ready to come out of hiding. Her decision puts them both back on the radar of his ruthless former handler (Cate Blanchett), leading to a deadly game of cat-and-mouse during which all are determined to tie up loose ends from the past. While bearing the marks of many a trained-killer thriller, Atonement director Joe Wright frequently goes off road to make it a relentlessly intriguing and exhilarating ride.
attributes.title: Hanna

attributes.synopsis: CIA agent Angelina Jolie goes on the run when she is accused of being a Russian spy. Action thriller with Liev Schreiber. Violence/flashing images. (2010)(96 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: CIA agent Angelina Jolie goes on the run when she is accused of being a Russian spy. Action and intrigue in this high-velocity espionage thriller.
attributes.synopsisLong: Angelina Jolie is Evelyn Salt, a CIA operative who goes on the run after a Russian defector outs her as a Soviet sleeper spy. Hopping across freeway traffic, diving off subway trains and fisticuffing all-comers, she has to deploy all her skills as a covert spook to elude Chiwetel Ejiofor's persistent CIA man and the deadly attentions of a mysterious Russian spymaster. Pleasingly preposterous, it's a thriller to be taken with a hefty pinch of salt. And that's a condiment.
attributes.title: Salt

attributes.synopsis: A troubled, reclusive Wolverine must protect an ailing Professor X and a mysterious young mutant from dark forces. Hugh Jackman stars. (2017)(132 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A troubled Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) must protect an ailing Professor X and a mysterious young mutant from dark forces. Gritty action thriller.
attributes.synopsisLong: The claws come out again for Wolverine (Hugh Jackman), now eking out a bleak existence in the Mexican desert with the outcast Caliban (Stephen Merchant) and an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart). Making a buck as a hard-drinking limo driver, his self-imposed exile ends with the arrival of Laura (Dafne Keen), a young mutant with a shady background. She's also on the wanted list of a cybernetic psycho (Boyd Holbrook) and his sinister boss (Richard E Grant). Dark, disturbing and ultra-violent, this chapter of the X-Men saga is blood red in tooth and claw.
attributes.title: Logan

attributes.synopsis: Black and white version of the gritty comic book hit. A troubled Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) must protect an ailing Professor X and a mysterious young mutant from dark forces. (2017)(132 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Black and white version of the comic book hit. A troubled Wolverine must protect an ailing Professor X and a mysterious young mutant from dark forces.
attributes.synopsisLong: Black and white version of the gritty comic book hit. The claws come out again for Wolverine (Hugh Jackman), now eking out a bleak existence in the Mexican desert with the outcast Caliban (Stephen Merchant) and an ailing Professor X (Patrick Stewart). Making a buck as a hard-drinking limo driver, his self-imposed exile ends with the arrival of Laura (Dafne Keen), a young mutant with a shady background. She's also on the wanted list of a cybernetic psycho (Boyd Holbrook) and his sinister boss (Richard E Grant). Dark, disturbing and ultra-violent, this chapter of the X-Men saga is blood red in tooth and claw.
attributes.title: Logan Noir

attributes.synopsis: From Canadian kid to metal-boned mutant, the history of Hugh Jackman's clawed crusader is revealed. Action with Ryan Reynolds. Contains violence and flashing images. (2009)(103 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: From Canadian kid to metal-boned mutant, the history of Hugh Jackman's clawed crusader is revealed. Action with Ryan Reynolds.
attributes.synopsisLong: From Canadian kid to metal-boned mutant, the history of Hugh Jackman's clawed crusader is revealed. Action with Ryan Reynolds.
attributes.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

attributes.synopsis: While rival pilot Val Kilmer battles to become dogfighting ace, hotshot Tom Cruise romances sexy tutor Kelly McGillis. Action. Contains strong language. (1986)(106 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Whilst romancing sexy tutor Kelly McGillis, Tom Cruise battles rival pilot Val Kilmer to become the best at the Top Gun academy.
attributes.synopsisLong: Tony Scott's zeitgeist-capturing actioner defined his own career and shot Tom Cruise into the Hollywood stratosphere as pilot Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell, the most talented - and reckless - recruit at the US Navy's elite 'Top Gun' air combat training school. Rival hotshot Val Kilmer runs him close in the testosterone stakes, but with Anthony Edwards as his wingman and Kelly McGillis as the civilian lecturer who gets that loving feeling, there's no question about who's got the greatest need for speed. And if there's any doubt about the meaning of Berlin's Oscar-winning song Take My Breath Away, just check out Scott's aerial action sequences. A true modern great.
attributes.title: Top Gun

attributes.synopsis: Assassin Timothy Olyphant is caught up in a deadly conspiracy when a hit goes wrong and he's stuck with a Russian callgirl. Strong language/strong violence/flashing images. (2007)(90 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Adaptation of the popular video game series starring Timothy Olyphant as an elite, genetically-engineered assassin caught up in a deadly conspiracy.
attributes.synopsisLong: Assassin Timothy Olyphant is caught up in a deadly conspiracy when a hit goes wrong and he's stuck with a Russian callgirl. Strong language/strong violence/flashing images. (2007)(90 mins)
attributes.title: Hitman

attributes.synopsis: Mark Wahlberg is the tough detective obsessively hunting the killer of his wife and child in this adaptation of the hit video game. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2008)(96 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mark Wahlberg is the tough detective obsessively hunting the killer of his wife and child in this adaptation of the hit video game.
attributes.synopsisLong: Mark Wahlberg is the tough detective obsessively hunting the killer of his wife and child in this adaptation of the hit video game. (2008)(96 mins)
attributes.title: Max Payne

attributes.synopsis: When genetically engineered dinosaurs break loose on a remote island, a group of experts are on the menu. Classic from Steven Spielberg. Contains violence/flashing images. (1993)(122 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When genetically engineered dinosaurs break loose on a remote island, a group of experts are on the menu. Classic from Steven Spielberg.
attributes.synopsisLong: Breaking - and shaking - new ground with its monster special effects, Steven Spielberg's box office colossus brings Michael Crichton's bestseller to breathtakingly convincing life. Richard Attenborough is the well-meaning billionaire who unveils an island theme park full of cloned dinosaurs to his two grandchildren and three disbelieving scientists (Sam Neill, Laura Dern and Jeff Goldblum). Which is all wonderful until a power cut sets the meat-eaters free...
attributes.title: Jurassic Park

attributes.synopsis: In this hit sequel to Jurassic Park, scientists discover a second dinosaur island which has been untouched - until now... Contains moderate violence/flashing images. (1997)(134 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: In this hit sequel to Jurassic Park, scientists discover a second dinosaur island which has been untouched - until now...
attributes.synopsisLong: The prehistoric superstars are back, bigger and badder than ever as Steven Spielberg picks up what they didn't finish off in this rip-roaring, King Kong-style sequel. It seems there was a second island site, where dinosaurs were allowed to mix freely. Naturally, once a shady bio-engineering outfit gets wind of it, the dinos quickly get the upper hand... Jeff Goldblum returns as the maths genius trying to make sense of the chaos alongside his scientist girlfriend Julianne Moore... although Pete Postlethwaite is in no mood to support their scientific cause as a hard-headed hunter.
attributes.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park

attributes.synopsis: Dino expert Sam Neill is hired by warring couple William H Macy and Tea Leoni to rescue their son from raptors. Steven Spielberg produces. Contains violence. (2001)(93 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Dino expert Sam Neill is hired by warring couple William H Macy and Tea Leoni to rescue their son from raptors. Steven Spielberg produces.
attributes.synopsisLong: After two box office monsters from Steven Spielberg, director Joe 'Honey I Shrunk The Kids' Johnston takes the reins for the third trip to the island where dinosaurs rule and visitors are... dinner. It's a breathless ride, with Sam Neill's archaeologist Alan Grant returning to help a divorced couple (William H Macy and Tea Leoni) find their son, who's gone missing near the abandoned tropical theme park. Moving faster than a velociraptor on roller skates, the adventure sees the hapless humans facing prehistoric perils at every turn. Ptera-fyingly good fun.
attributes.title: Jurassic Park III

attributes.synopsis: A special, behind-the-scenes look at the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, an explosive action thriller featuring Guardians of the Galaxy and Avengers star Dave Bautista.
attributes.synopsisBrief: A special look at the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, an explosive action thriller featuring Guardians of the Galaxy and Avengers star Dave Bautista.
attributes.synopsisLong: A special, behind-the-scenes look at the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, an explosive action thriller featuring Guardians of the Galaxy and Avengers star Dave Bautista.
attributes.title: Final Score: Behind the Scenes

attributes.synopsis: Matt Damon is the US Army officer hunting WMDs in post-war Iraq in Paul Greengrass's action thriller. Brendan Gleeson co-stars. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2010)(110 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Matt Damon is the US Army officer hunting WMDs in post-war Iraq in Paul Greengrass's action thriller. Brendan Gleeson co-stars.
attributes.synopsisLong: Matt Damon is the US Army officer hunting WMDs in post-war Iraq in Paul Greengrass's action thriller. Brendan Gleeson co-stars.
attributes.title: Green Zone

attributes.synopsis: Sam Mendes directs this Gulf War drama starring Jake Gyllenhaal as the marine awaiting action in the Saudi Arabian desert. With Jamie Foxx. Strong language/violence/sex. (2005)(118 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Sam Mendes directs this Gulf War drama starring Jake Gyllenhaal as the marine awaiting action in the Saudi Arabian desert. With Jamie Foxx.
attributes.synopsisLong: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in Sam Mendes' eye-catching Gulf War drama based on the memoirs of U. S. marine Anthony Swofford. Gyllehaal plays Swofford himself, a 20-year-old, third generation enlistee sent to fight against Saddam's Iraqi invasion of Kuwait. 'Swoff' and his eager comrades are all ready to go out in a blaze of glory... but it's the boredom that's killing them.
attributes.title: Jarhead

attributes.synopsis: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily-armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. With Scott Adkins (The Expendables 2). (2016)(85 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A group of US marines are called into action when heavily-armed militants launch a surprise attack on an embassy in the Middle East. Action.
attributes.synopsisLong: Gung-ho US army Corporal Albright (Charlie Weber) falls out with laid-back Gunnery Sergeant Raines (Scott Adkins) when they're charged with guarding a US embassy in the Middle East. However, they have to put the friction behind them when it becomes apparent that the compound is under terrorist surveillance. When all hell breaks loose, Major  Lincoln (Dennis Haybert) is sent in with his team of special forces commandos.
attributes.title: Jarhead 3: The Siege

attributes.synopsis: Trapped and depleted, the British Army attempt to carry out a desperate evacuation of northern France. Gripping WWII epic from Christopher Nolan, starring Tom Hardy. (2017)(102 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Trapped and depleted, the British Army attempt to carry out a desperate evacuation of northern France. Gripping WWII epic from Christopher Nolan.
attributes.synopsisLong: The miraculous evacuation of almost 340,000 Allied soldiers while under constant fire from the advancing German Army has provided director Christopher Nolan with the subject for his most superlative film yet. Splitting the narrative into three strands - on the beach (Fionn Whitehead's teen squaddie), at sea (Mark Rylance's taciturn small boat captain) and in the air (Tom Hardy's clipped RAF Spitfire pilot) - he marshals the storylines into a visceral, compelling whole while providing a quality hitherto mostly absent from his work - genuine passion. It's a colossal, nerve-shredding effort and one where Nolan never puts a foot wrong.
attributes.title: Dunkirk (2017)

attributes.synopsis: Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama stars Tom Hanks as the hardened veteran leading a platoon on a risky WWII rescue mission. Contains strong language and violence.  (1998)(165 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Steven Spielberg's Oscar-winning drama stars Tom Hanks as the hardened veteran leading a platoon on a risky WWII rescue mission.
attributes.synopsisLong: Steven Spielberg won a second directing Oscar for his incendiary story of a World War Two rescue mission. After barely surviving the D-Day landings, Army captain Tom Hanks leads a small team of US soldiers to find and rescue a young private whose brothers have all been killed in action. Despite its distinctly American bias, Spielberg hits hard with an enthralling, based-on-fact war story. The hellish opening sequence is an astonishing experience in itself.
attributes.title: Saving Private Ryan

attributes.synopsis: Tom Cruise stars as a frustrated airline pilot who gets mixed up with both the CIA and drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. From Edge of Tomorrow's Doug Liman. (2017)(119 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Tom Cruise stars as a frustrated airline pilot who gets mixed up with both the CIA and drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. True-life thriller.
attributes.synopsisLong: This breezy crime thriller - based on real-life events and directed by The Bourne Identity and Edge of Tomorrow's Doug Liman - stars the evergreen Tom Cruise as Barry Seal, a frustrated TWA pilot whose thirst for adrenaline saw him quit the day job and get mixed up with the CIA. Initially he's hired by shadowy G-man Schafer (Domhnall Gleeson) to capture reconnaissance photos of Soviet-backed insurgents in South America, but soon enough he attracts the attention of Medelln drug kingpin Pablo Escobar... Support comes from Sarah Wright (Marry Me), Jesse Plemons (Bridge of Spies) and Get Out's Caleb Landry Jones.
attributes.title: American Made

attributes.synopsis: Oscar-winning epic starring Mel Gibson as William Wallace, the Scottish crusader who battles to protect his homeland. Contains violent scenes & flashing images. (1995)(171 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Oscar-winning epic starring Mel Gibson as William Wallace, the Scottish crusader who battles to protect his homeland.
attributes.synopsisLong: Mel Gibson directs and stars in the Oscar-winning story of legendary 13th century Scottish warrior William Wallace, the patriotic rebel who led a ragged but courageous army against the English and their tyrannical king Edward Longshanks (Patrick McGoohan). Epic battles, swoonsome romance (with local lassie Catherine McCormack and, teasingly, French princess Sophie Marceau) and a bold interpretation of history make this an adventure for the ages. Won Oscars for Best Picture, Best Director, Effects, Make-Up and Cinematography.
attributes.title: Braveheart

attributes.synopsis: Mel Gibson stars as a reluctant hero protecting his family, in this all-action epic set against the backdrop of the American War of Independence. (2000)(158 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Mel Gibson stars as a reluctant hero protecting his family, in this all-action epic set against the backdrop of the American War of Independence.
attributes.synopsisLong: Roland Emmerich's explosive historical epic sees Mel Gibson take the fight to the evil Brits once again, this time for the home side in America's War of Independence. When the invading British militia show no mercy to his family, farmer Benjamin Martin (Gibson) takes up arms alongside his eldest son (Heath Ledger) to do his duty as a patriot... and pursue his own vengeful cause. Saving Private Ryan writer Robert Rodat pens another rousing adventure.
attributes.title: The Patriot (2000)

attributes.synopsis: Epic action as Navy scrappers Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard take on an alien armada. With Rihanna. Violence/flashing images. (2012)(131 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Epic action as Navy scrappers Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard take on an alien armada. Also starring Rihanna.
attributes.synopsisLong: Epic action as Navy scrappers Taylor Kitsch, Liam Neeson and Alexander Skarsgard take on an alien armada. Also starring Rihanna.
attributes.title: Battleship

attributes.synopsis: ...Curse Of The Black Pearl: Johnny Depp and Orlando Bloom cross swords with ghostly sea dog Geoffrey Rush in a hearty adventure on the high seas. With Keira Knightley. (2003)(138 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Johnny Depp and Orlando Bloom cross swords with ghostly sea dog Geoffrey Rush in a hearty adventure on the high seas.
attributes.synopsisLong: Disney's swashbuckling franchise-starter stars Johnny Depp as Captain Jack Sparrow, a hornswaggled corsair who declares war on his mutinous crew when they make off with his beloved ship The Black Pearl. Described as "without doubt the worst pirate I've ever seen", the deranged dandy is out for revenge after ex first mate Cap'n Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) marooned him on a desert island. To complicate matters, the gold stashed on the Pearl carries a curse... which, in the moonlight, turns all aboard into the ultimate 'skeleton crew'. Adding to the stormy mix are a fearless blacksmith called Will (Orlando Bloom) and a feisty governor's daughter (Keira Knightley) who holds the key to the curse. Anchors aweigh!
attributes.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: The...

attributes.synopsis: ...Man's Chest: Johnny Depp's swaggering Captain Jack returns, taking the fight to soul-sucker Davy Jones. Swashbuckling sequel with Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley. (2006)(145 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Johnny Depp's swaggering Captain Jack returns, taking the fight to soul-sucker Davy Jones. Swashbuckling sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: Johnny Depp's swaggering Captain Jack returns, taking the fight to soul-sucker Davy Jones. Swashbuckling sequel.
attributes.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead...

attributes.synopsis: ...World's End: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett. With Geoffrey Rush. (2007)(162 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett.
attributes.synopsisLong: Johnny Depp returns in a scorching sequel that sees Will and Elizabeth try to unite the pirate lords against vile blaggard Lord Beckett.
attributes.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At...

attributes.synopsis: ...Salazar's Revenge: Swashbuckling high-seas adventure pitting Johnny Depp's Captain Jack Sparrow against undead pirate hunter Javier Bardem. With Geoffrey Rush. (2017)(124 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Swashbuckling high-seas adventure pitting Johnny Depp's Captain Jack Sparrow against undead pirate hunter Javier Bardem. With Geoffrey Rush.
attributes.synopsisLong: Johnny Depp returns as eccentric sea dog Captain Jack Sparrow for the fifth fantasy adventure in Disney's swashbuckling series. This time he's the target of deadly ghost pirates who, led by his terrifying old nemesis Captain Salazar (Javier Bardem), escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea... and he's at the top of their list. Jack's only hope of survival lies in finding the legendary Trident of Poseidon, which bestows upon its possessor total control over the oceans. Prepare to have your timbers well and truly shivered.
attributes.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean....

attributes.synopsis: Cult action fantasy about immortal warriors destined to battle through the centuries. Queen power the soundtrack, while Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star. (1986)(112 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Cult action fantasy about immortal warriors destined to battle through the centuries. Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star.
attributes.synopsisLong: Cult action fantasy about immortal warriors destined to battle through the centuries. Queen power the soundtrack, while Christopher Lambert and Sean Connery star.
attributes.title: Highlander

attributes.synopsis: Adaptation of Stephen King's fantasy saga, starring Idris Elba as a gunslinger locked in an ages-old battle with sorcerer Matthew McConaughey. (2017)(91 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Adaptation of Stephen King's fantasy saga, starring Idris Elba as a mysterious gunslinger battling evil sorcerer Matthew McConaughey.
attributes.synopsisLong: Stephen King's seven-instalment fantasy series gets the big-screen treatment, with young Brit Tom Taylor (seen in TV's Doctor Foster) playing chosen one Jake Chambers. Blessed with a psychic gift known as "the shine", Jake becomes aware of the titular Dark Tower - a soaring structure that prevents the many dimensions of reality from splitting apart at the seams. It's a power that also attracts the unwanted attention of Matthew McConaughey's Walter Padick, a sinister sorcerer - otherwise known as the Man in Black - locked in an ages-old battle with mysterious protector the Gunslinger (Idris Elba). Nikolaj Arcel, known for the Oscar-nominated A Royal Affair, directs.
attributes.title: The Dark Tower (2017)

attributes.synopsis: Epic action and Oscar-winning special effects in James Cameron's record-breaking sci-fi spectacular. Strong langauge/fantasy violence/flashing images. (2009)(156 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Epic action and Oscar-winning special effects in James Cameron's record-breaking sci-fi spectacular. Sam Worthington and Zoe Saldana star.
attributes.synopsisLong: James Cameron's ground-breaking sci-fi epic depicts a future where the resource-starved human race has found the answer to all its problems on the lush moon Pandora... which is making the native Na'vi - blue, ten feet tall, and fiercely protective of their home - very restless. And it seems that sending in 'avatars' - human/Na'vi clones of volunteers like wounded marine Jake Sully (Sam Worthington) - won't be enough to resolve the conflict peacefully. The biggest moneyspinner of all time, it deserves every penny.
attributes.title: Avatar

attributes.synopsis: Three luckless friends travel to Colombia and hatch a dangerous plan to capture a notorious drug kingpin and claim the $25 million reward. Action comedy with Eddie Griffin. (2017)(87 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Three luckless friends travel to Colombia and hatch a dangerous plan to capture a drug kingpin and claim the $25 million reward. Action comedy.
attributes.synopsisLong: Three luckless friends travel to Colombia and hatch a dangerous plan to capture a notorious drug kingpin and claim the $25 million reward. Action comedy with Eddie Griffin and Danny Trejo.
attributes.title: All About The Money

attributes.synopsis: Ex-convict Michael Caine hatches an audacious plan to steal $4 million, involving a bus, two Jaguars and, of course, three Mini Coopers. Comic adventure. Flashing images. (1969)(95 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Classic caper about a plan to steal a gold shipment from the streets of Turin by creating a traffic jam. Starring Mini Coopers and Michael Caine.
attributes.synopsisLong: Criminal masterminds Michael Caine and Noel Coward pull off the classic caper that blows the bloody doors off all others. When incarcerated crime king Mr Bridger (Coward) gets wind of a stash of gold bullion in Turin, he dispatches Charlie Croker (Caine) - the coolest crook on the outside - to go and nick it. All he needs is a technical genius to cause a traffic jam (Benny Hill! ), a few good drivers, an empty bus and three Minis - one red, one white, one blue...
attributes.title: Italian Job, The (1969)

attributes.synopsis: A gang of double-crossed thieves plan to cause a monumental traffic jam in a bid to reclaim their loot. Starring Mark Wahlberg. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2003)(106mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A gang of double-crossed thieves plan to cause a monumental traffic jam in a bid to reclaim their loot. Mark Wahlberg and Ed Norton star.
attributes.synopsisLong: The Minis (the sexy new BMW version), the title plus a tenuous Italian connection are about all that remain from the classic 1969 British heist caper - but there's no denying it's an exciting ride. Mark Wahlberg replaces Michael Caine as cheeky mastermind Charlie Croker and the action switches from Turin to LA. Charlize Theron joins the crew as a slinky safecracker and Jason Statham provides the muscle, while Edward Norton throws himself into gear for chief villain duty.
attributes.title: The Italian Job (2003)

attributes.synopsis: The crew of a damaged colony ship discover a seemingly hospitable planet and go in for a closer look. Bad move. Sci-fi horror from Ridley Scott. (2017)(117 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: The crew of a damaged colony ship discover a seemingly hospitable planet and go in for a closer look. Bad move. Sci-fi horror from Ridley Scott.
attributes.synopsisLong: The sixth instalment in the iconic Alien series sees the returning Ridley Scott in a giving mood - if you want blood, you got it. Just minutes in, the Covenant - an enormous vessel careering through space in search of a habitable planet - has suffered devastating losses. All it takes is one freak power surge and the crew, including Katherine Waterston's Daniels, cowboy-hatted pilot Tennessee (Danny McBride) and creepy synthetic Walter (Michael Fassbender), are down dozens of colonists and a captain (a cameoing James Franco). Pretty soon parasitic space nasties are exploding out of chests, spines and everything in between.
attributes.title: Alien: Covenant

attributes.synopsis: A fierce martial arts master (Jet Li) shows no mercy until a blind beauty opens his eyes to honour. Award-winning action. Mandarin with subtitles. Violence/flashing images. (2006)(101 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Action starring Jet Li as a fierce martial arts master who shows no mercy until a blind beauty opens his eyes to honour. In Mandarin with subtitles.
attributes.synopsisLong: Hong Kong action maestro Jet Li takes his curtain call as a high-kicking chop socky merchant in this enjoyable yarn chronicling the rise and fall of Chinese martial arts master Huo Yuanjia. We follow Li as pride comes before a fall and he's nursed back to physical and mental well being by an old crone and her blind granddaughter. Superlative action from director Ronny Yu.
attributes.title: Jet Li's Fearless

attributes.synopsis: Action thriller starring Ben Affleck as a high-functioning autistic number-cruncher who moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. With Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons. (2016)(123 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Action thriller starring Ben Affleck as a high-functioning autistic number-cruncher who moonlights as a money launderer for the mob.
attributes.synopsisLong: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher (and crack assassin) Christian Wolff (Ben Affleck) works as a shadily effective auditor for some of the world's nastiest criminal gangs. His latest job is to find where millions of dollars leached from an apparently above-board robotics company has gone after a junior employee (Anna Kendrick) spotted the leak. However, Treasury Department agent Ray King (JK Simmons) is beginning to close in and Wolff discovers his latest job comes with a very high body count. Director Gavin O'Connor capably balances the books between action and intrigue.
attributes.title: The Accountant

attributes.synopsis: Wise-cracking Miami cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence fight to protect a witness and bring down a heroin crook. Action comedy. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (1995)(114 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Wise-cracking Miami cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence fight to protect a witness and bring down a heroin crook. Action comedy.
attributes.synopsisLong: Will Smith wisecracked his way to international stardom in this explosive action comedy directed by the king of movie carnage Michael Bay. Smith and Martin Lawrence are the Miami cops who trade zingy quips as they bring their own unique brand of justice to the streets of Miami. This assignment sees them protecting witness Tea Leoni from a brutal drug lord. No sweat... but lots of noise.
attributes.title: Bad Boys

attributes.synopsis: A top-secret mission to the mysterious Skull Island quickly descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Tom Hiddleston stars. (2017)(114 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A top-secret mission to the mysterious Skull Island descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Tom Hiddleston stars.
attributes.synopsisLong: The legend of King Kong gets a rip-roaring reimagining in this monstrous mash-up of Apocalypse Now and Jurassic Park. It's 1973 and as the US withdraws troops from Vietnam, a helicopter unit led by Lt Colonel Packard (Samuel L Jackson) is assigned to escort a secret expedition to map an uncharted Pacific island "where myth and science meet". Like the soldiers and scientists, British tracker Conrad (Tom Hiddlestone) and war photographer Weaver (Brie Larson) think they've seen it all. But the island's resident ape-god knocks that idea out of them before their feet have even touched the ground... And that's just the beginning. Survival of the fittest? You'd better get fitter.
attributes.title: Kong: Skull Island

attributes.synopsis: Vigilante thriller starring Charles Bronson as a peaceful man who snaps after his daughter is raped and his wife murdered. From Michael Winner. Strong language/violence. (1974)(84 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Vigilante thriller starring Charles Bronson as a peaceful man who snaps after his daughter is raped and his wife murdered. From Michael Winner.
attributes.synopsisLong: Love him or loathe him, director turned gourmand Michael Winner created a major stir with his guns 'n' grudges vigilante series starring Charles Bronson. He of the killer moustache and great escapes is prompted to rid New York of its sidewalk scum when his wife is slaughtered and daughter reduced to a vegetable. If you overlook the dodgy morality, there's some thrilling action scenes and Bronson liked it so much he made two more after Winner jumped ship after DW3.
attributes.title: Death Wish

attributes.synopsis: When his girlfriend is kidnapped, cop John Cena must complete 12 perilous challenges in order to save her life. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2009)(104 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: When his girlfriend is kidnapped, cop John Cena must complete 12 perilous challenges in order to save her life.
attributes.synopsisLong: WWE hero John Cena teams up with Die Hard 2 and The Long Kiss Goodnight director Renny Harlin for a non-stop thrill ride through the streets of New Orleans. Cena is Danny Fisher, a cop whose life becomes hell when a notorious criminal seeks revenge by kidnapping his girl. To find his love, Danny must negotiate a series of traps and clues, the 12 rounds of the title, left by the mad mastermind. Game of Thrones' Aidan Gillen is on bad guy duties in this high-speed, rough-and-tumble actionfest.
attributes.title: 12 Rounds

attributes.synopsis: Bike courier Joseph Gordon-Levitt runs into trouble when a corrupt cop plots to steal a priceless package. Strong language/violence/flashing images. (2012)(90 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Bike courier Joseph Gordon-Levitt rides headlong into trouble when a corrupt cop plots to steal a priceless package.
attributes.synopsisLong: A fearless New York despatch cyclist finds himself the target of a corrupt cop when he's given a mysterious message to deliver from one end of Manhattan to the other. Joseph Gordon-Levitt puts his foot down as the precocious pedaller while Michael Shannon delivers a swivel-eyed study in evil as the bent NYPD detective hot on his trail. Writer-director David Koepp never lets the momentum falter in a high adrenaline thrill ride terrifyingly shot at street level and boasting some eye-popping chases through the Big Apple rush hour.
attributes.title: Premium Rush

attributes.synopsis: Ex-CIA man Robert De Niro leads a disparate group of mercenaries on a daring European heist. Scorching action thriller co-starring Jean Reno. Strong language/violence. (1998)(118 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Ex-CIA man Robert De Niro leads a disparate group of mercenaries on a daring European heist. Scorching action thriller co-starring Jean Reno.
attributes.synopsisLong: Veteran director John 'The Manchurian Candidate' Frankenheimer's action thriller stars Robert De Niro as a freelance intelligence expert hired by an Irish terrorist (Natascha McElhone) to steal a mysterious briefcase. Fellow mercenaries Jean Reno, Stellan Starsgard and Sean Bean join the crew as Frankenheimer engineers a breakneck ride through the European underworld, replete with gun battles, double-crosses and a succession of seatbelt-straining car chases. Look out for ice skating star Katarina Witt on her big-screen debut.
attributes.title: Ronin

attributes.synopsis: Tobey Maguire returns as the Webbed Wonder, battling evil with Kirsten Dunst at his side. Action-packed superhero sequel. Flashing images. (2004)(123 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: Tobey Maguire returns as the Webbed Wonder, battling evil in New York with Kirsten Dunst at his side. Action-packed superhero sequel.
attributes.synopsisLong: There's no rest for the arachnid as Tobey Maguire's Spider-Man tries to rid New York of Alfred Molina's eight-armed madman Doctor Octopus. To add to his problems, poor old Peter Parker is still having issues with his sweetheart Mary-Jane (Kirsten Dunst). Yet again, director Sam Raimi spins an inescapable web of eye-popping, Oscar-winning SFX, heart-stopping drama and superguy-meets-girl romance. Best sequel ever made? Forget about it. Best comic book movie ever made - that's closer to the mark.
attributes.title: Spider-Man 2

attributes.synopsis: A young Bruce Lee looks to make a name for himself in 1960s San Francisco, soon challenging Shaolin master Wong Jack Man to an epic showdown. Martial arts biopic. (2016)(92 mins)
attributes.synopsisBrief: A young Bruce Lee looks to make a name for himself in 1960s San Francisco, soon challenging Shaolin master Wong Jack Man to an epic showdown.
attributes.synopsisLong: A young Bruce Lee looks to make a name for himself in 1960s San Francisco, soon challenging Shaolin master Wong Jack Man to an epic showdown. Martial arts biopic.
attributes.title: Birth Of The Dragon
